name: Forsyth Housing Authority
description: Affordable housing programs, rental assistance, and Section 8 voucher support for eligible residents.

name: Forsyth County Food Pantry
description: Emergency food assistance and weekly food distribution for families in need throughout the county.

name: Community Health Center
description: Affordable primary care, dental, and vision services on a sliding fee scale based on income.

name: Avita Community Partners
description: Comprehensive behavioral health services including counseling, crisis support, and substance abuse treatment.

name: Adult Learning Center
description: GED preparation, ESL classes, computer literacy, and career readiness programs for adults.

name: WorkSource Georgia
description: Job search assistance, resume help, interview coaching, and connection to local employers.

name: Boys & Girls Club of Forsyth
description: After-school programs, summer camps, and youth development activities for ages 6-18.

name: LIHEAP Energy Assistance
description: Help with utility bills for low-income households, including heating and cooling assistance.

name: Senior Services Center
description: Meals on Wheels, transportation assistance, social activities, and wellness programs for seniors.
